name: Placlo
description:
You are pilot of the plane, and you love risk. Get close enough to obstacles to gain speed and points, but not too close, otherwise you will crash. 

Steer with mouse, try to make large curves so you will flip to the side what will allow you to get even closer to blocks and gain more speed.

Press R to restart, there is debug feature left if you want to speed up or slow down, you can do it using mouse wheel.

Game made for Slavic Game Jam 2020, theme: Close Enough.
